purpose: Machine-readable brand configuration for AI agents and automated systems

brand.description: A dynamic and vibrant destination designed to provide a comprehensive and engaging experience for families of all ages. Originally known as Launch Trampoline Park, it has evolved into a full-service family entertainment center with activities and attractions for children and adults.

people_and_team: We believe if you build great people, they will build a great company.
We believe it takes a team to provide the best experiences; every position and every player is valued.
We believe in ongoing recognition and personal growth of our team.
attitude_and_behavior: We believe you should throw laughter, smiles and kindness around like confetti.
We believe happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
We believe in being enthusiastic and having a positive attitude.
We believe you are always responsible for how you act, no matter how you feel.
We believe in being kind and treating others like you want to be treated.
learning_and_growth: We believe you can learn great things from your mistakes when you aren't busy denying them.
We believe success is the result of ambition, hard work and learning from failure.
We believe the world is changed by our example, not our opinion.
We believe when we focus on possibilities, we'll have more opportunities.
guest_experience: We believe in treating our customers like long lost friends that we are excited to see.
We believe families deserve to have an amazing guest experience, while creating unique memories that they will cherish.
community: We believe in being a great neighbor and giving back to our community.
operations: We believe in safety. Safety for our team and safety for our guests.
We believe in providing a clean, organized facility at all times.
We believe even the smallest detail can have a big impact.

beliefs_flat: We believe if you build great people, they will build a great company.
We believe you can learn great things from your mistakes when you aren't busy denying them.
We believe you should throw laughter, smiles and kindness around like confetti.
We believe success is the result of ambition, hard work and learning from failure.

We believe the world is changed by our example, not our opinion.
We believe when we focus on possibilities, we'll have more opportunities.
We believe you are always responsible for how you act, no matter how you feel.
We believe in treating our customers like long lost friends that we are excited to see.
We believe in being a great neighbor and giving back to our community.
We believe families deserve to have an amazing guest experience, while creating unique memories that they will cherish.
We believe in being kind and treating others like you want to be treated.
We believe in being enthusiastic and having a positive attitude.
We believe in ongoing recognition and personal growth of our team.
We believe in safety. Safety for our team and safety for our guests.
We believe in providing a clean, organized facility at all times.
We believe it takes a team to provide the best experiences; every position and every player is valued.
We believe even the smallest detail can have a big impact.

gradients.usage_note: Secondary colors and dual gradients can be used as accents for boxes, shadow elements, etc.

primary.description: Bold fonts increase visual weight, making text easier to read. Headlines are meant to be quickly and easily understood.

secondary.description: Perfect for paragraph text or fine print.

fallback.note: Use when Futura is not available (Google Drive, Canva)

typography.font_family_description: Futura's design is based on geometric shapes, especially circles, which gives it a clean, modern, and timeless look. The clear and straightforward design ensures high legibility.

headlines.reason: Visual weight, easy to read, quickly understood

sub_headers.reason: Info to see directly after headline

buttons.reason: Easy to read, shows up well on color choices

body_text.reason: Perfect for paragraphs and fine print

primary.name: Primary Logo
primary.description: Main voice and signature of the brand. Should be used most frequently when space allows.

clear_space.description: Minimum distance between logo and other graphic elements

secondary.name: Secondary Logo (Alternative Logo)
secondary.description: Uses components from main logo in variation. Use when primary logo doesn't fit.

clear_space.description: Minimum distance between logo and other graphic elements

icon.name: Joey Icon
icon.description: Symbol embodying brand identity. Modern, clean version of Joey the Kangaroo. Represents that brand appeals to whole family, not just children.

clear_space.description: Minimum distance between icon and other graphic elements

icon_behind_logo.description: In rare cases when icon is shown behind full logo

logo_rules.single_color_note: Especially effective for merchandise where single color is most cost effective

drop_shadow.usage: Can help logo pop off image or design
drop_shadow.guidance: Use with best judgment, refer to design guide for aesthetics

prohibited_actions.description: Don't change the color to any of the secondary Launch colors or gradients
Don't skew and stretch the logo
Don't change the layout and arrangement of the logo
Don't add a stroke to the logo
Don't add any graphic assets into or behind the logo
Don't add any seasonal themes to the logo
Don't use the old logo or Joey silhouette on print or social media going forward
Don't put the logo over photos that make it difficult to read

mascot.name: Joey
mascot.description: One of the greatest promotional tools. Kids and parents alike are drawn to Joey with his lovable character and connection to Launch.
purpose: Boosts visibility, memorability, and customer loyalty
Can become iconic element of company legacy
Cultivates brand loyalty through positive associations

background_texture.purpose: Enhances visual appeal, creates depth, makes design look three-dimensional and engaging

photography.overall_feeling: Dynamic and vibrant destination with an engaging experience for families of all ages

benefits.audience_engagement: High-quality visuals grab attention, increase likes, comments, shares
benefits.reach_and_visibility: Algorithms favor visual content, wider audience reach
benefits.conversion_rates: Compelling imagery persuades action (purchase, website visit, event attendance)
benefits.shareable_content: Eye-catching content extends organic reach, attracts new customers

rules: Use font pairings within posts - do not use random fonts
Do not use random colors - stick to brand colors
Keep Instagram highlights, stories, and posts visually consistent with branding (colors and fonts)

requirements: All communications must be honest, truthful and not misleading
Prepared with a sense of social responsibility
Showcase safe environments where rules are being adhered to

asset_selection.description: Programmatic logic for selecting the correct asset based on context

content_patterns.description: Pre-approved copy patterns for AI content generation
